title: Beautiful 3BR home for rent in Detroit Shoreway/Gordon Square Area
posting_body: Come check out this gorgeous single-family home that was rehabbed in 2018 right near Gordon Square.
This home has an open floor plan on the first floor with living room, dining room, a giant kitchen, half bath, and mud room.
The second floor has 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths, and laundry.
The third floor can be used as a 3rd bedroom or office and living space.
The back yard is fenced-in and has a 2-car attached garage.
The front of the house has a large front porch that is great for sitting out on warm summer days.
This house is a very short walk from the Gordon Square Arts District, Edgewater Park, and new bike trails.
Come check out this house to live in one of Cleveland's hottest areas!
Open to shorter-term leases and can negotiate option of partial or fully-furnished.
Email or text to set up a showing.
